Press Releases.Title: 469 New Cases of Covid-19 Infection
Press Releases.MainContent:
As of 27 July 2020, 12pm, the Ministry of Health (MOH) has preliminarily confirmed an additional 469 cases of COVID-19 infection in Singapore, the vast majority of whom are Work Permit holders residing in foreign worker dormitories. Based on our investigations so far, there are 2 cases in the community, of whom 1 is a Singaporean and 1 is a Work Pass holder. 

2.    In addition, there are 15 imported cases who had all been placed on Stay-Home Notice upon arrival in Singapore.  

3.    We are still working through the details of the cases, and further updates will be shared via the MOH press release that will be issued tonight. 


MINISTRY OF HEALTH
27 JULY 2020
